ar: وَلَوْ تَرَى إِذْ وُقِفُوا عَلَى النَّارِ
en: If you could but see when they are made to stand before the Fire

ar: وَلَوْ تَرَى إِذْ وُقِفُوا عَلَى النَّارِ
en: If you could but see when they are made to stand before the Fire
and will say, "Oh, would that we could be returned [to life on earth]
and will say, "Oh, would that we could be returned [to life on earth]
and not deny the signs of our Lord
and be among the believers."

ar: بَلْ بَدَا لَهُم مَّا كَانُوا يُخْفُونَ مِن قَبْلُ
en: But what they concealed before has [now] appeared to them.

ar: بَلْ بَدَا لَهُم مَّا كَانُوا يُخْفُونَ مِن قَبْلُ
en: But what they concealed before has [now] appeared to them.

ar: وَلَوْ رُدُّوا لَعَادُوا لِمَا نُهُوا عَنْهُ
en: And even if they were returned, they would return to that which they were forbidden;

ar: وَلَوْ رُدُّوا لَعَادُوا لِمَا نُهُوا عَنْهُ
en: And even if they were returned, they would return to that which they were forbidden;
and indeed, they are liars.

ar: وَقَالُوا إِنْ هِىَ إِلَّا حَيَاتُنَا الدُّنْيَا
en: And they say, "There is none but our worldly life,

ar: وَقَالُوا إِنْ هِىَ إِلَّا حَيَاتُنَا الدُّنْيَا
en: And they say, "There is none but our worldly life,
and we will not be resurrected."

ar: وَلَوْ تَرَى إِذْ وُقِفُوا عَلَى رَبِّهِمْ
en: If you could but see when they will be made to stand before their Lord.
He will say, "Is this not the truth?"
They will say, "Yes, by our Lord."
He will [then] say, "So taste the punishment
He will [then] say, "So taste the punishment
for what you used to deny."
